plugin-data.name: MinJs Compiler
plugin-data.description: A Javascript minifier for compressing and making ugly these huge js files. Uses the JShrink (https://github.com/tedious/JShrink) minfier from Tedious Developments.

please-support-mrbot: If you enjoy my plugin, please support me by clicking the button below. Thank you!
minjs-help: A Javascript minifier for compressing and making ugly these huge js files. Uses the JShrink (https://github.com/tedious/JShrink) minfier from Tedious Developments. Just add the source of an JS folder and the target for the compiled JS file and the JShrink compressor does the rest.
minjs-only-min-file-info: Only save the minified file, else both the compressed and uncompressed version are saved in the target folder.
minjs-enter-source: Enter the source file or path. If it's a path, all JS files in that path are merged alphabetically into one js file.
minjs-enter-target: Enter the target file. The compiled version will generate a '.min.js' and if needed a '.js'.
